customTheme.name: Custom
customTheme.description: A clean and versatile theme with a neutral color palette. It features a range of customizable typography, layout, and color options to suit various design needs.
customTheme.intent: To provide a modern and professional look with high contrast and readability, suitable for a wide range of applications.
